ratings.comment: Easily one of the best instructors in the ESL department! Just concentrate and give him all your attention, and you'll easily pass. I visited his office multiple times during office hours, and he was very understanding and supportive.

Professor Azocar is really a very nice teacher. I. took his ESL116 and ESL118 during the freshman year. He really give great feedbacks of my essays, and as long as you could talk to him and understand his points, you could get good grades.
Best lecturer in ESL serial courses!
The best professor to have for ESL 118, especially since he's so flexible with deadlines. He clearly cares for his students and is always willing to help improve your grade, 10/10 would recommend

Clearly cares about his students and wants them all to succeed in his class, make sure you put in effort and you'll be rewarded. Also very flexible with deadlines as long as you inform him beforehand, overall good class.
Professor Azocar is really helpful with clear and reasonable instructions. He is also the considerate and responsible.

Professor Azocar is one of the best professors! 118 class is time consuming, no matter who you take it with. But if you are lucky enough, you will get to this professor. He is very kind. Always ready to help. I am so happy I took this class with him! I highly recommend him!
He's a great professor who'll grade fairly based on how much effort you put into your work.

Even though he did not provide clear grading criteria, he was helpful and fair overall. Visit his office to get extra advice for your paper before you turn it in. It would help you a lot. I got A in this class but it was not easy. You should put effort and time outside class to get a good grade. I would like to recommend him! :)
He is specific with his expectations and genuinely help students achieve it. I love his class!
If you do what he tell you to do, you would get at least a B without spending much time on your paper. But, getting an A is pretty doable.
My first A in college. Like the other guys said, Alejandro is fair. You will definitely earn a grade if you paid the effort, is that simple.
he's a very nice guy who goes the extra mile to help students who seek his help. Though he may seem mean, (especially when it comes to grades) he's actually a pretty fair instructor.
He is just the nicest guy I have ever met in English department.  very helpful, and you will get an A if you just keep working with assignments.
